summary: The course covers a range of topics essential for Fortinet Network Security Expert certification, including Introduction and Initial Configuration, Security Fabric, Firewall Policies, Network Address Translation (NAT), Firewall Authentication, Logging and Monitoring, Certificate Operations, Web Filtering, Application Control, Antivirus, Intrusion Prevention and Denial of Service, SSL VPN, and Dialup IPsec VPN. full_text:
COURSE NAME: Fortinet Network Security Expert NSE4

COURSE OVERVIEW: The course is designed to equip participants with the necessary certification in the field of cyber security, focusing on Fortinet Network Security.

COURSE SCHEDULE: The course will commence on 13.12.2024. Classes will be held on Tuesdays from 17:30 to 21:30 and on Fridays from 09:00 to 13:00. The course consists of 10 sessions, totaling 50 academic hours.

LEARNING FORMAT: The course is offered in a hybrid format. Participants can choose to attend classes either on the Bar-Ilan University campus in Ramat Gan or via Zoom.

COURSE TOPICS: The course covers a comprehensive range of topics including:
- Introduction and Initial Configuration
- Security Fabric
- Firewall Policies
- Network Address Translation (NAT)
- Firewall Authentication
- Logging and Monitoring
- Certificate Operations
- Web Filtering
- Application Control
- Antivirus
- Intrusion Prevention and Denial of Service
- SSL VPN
- Dialup IPsec VPN

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: To schedule an admission interview and register, please contact Esther Asulin at 052-5886002 or via email at esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: The course is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University.
